body: I guess you meant to set `requires_grad=false` on the new_tensor. Yes, I can do that if it is sufficient. Please note that `grad_fn` will still be created for new_tensor at [s_copy_](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/9a7c196040f55d921a4deee42cbb1dd294b8f23b/tools/autograd/templates/VariableType.cpp#L408-L415). If we need to be more careful, then I can also pass in a `requires_grad` args to `s_copy_` to avoid silently ignored `requires_grad` at `torch.tensor()`. Which way is preferred? @ezyang @apaszke
